children.value: Icon Tooltip used to clarify the action or name of an interactive icon button.

The primary purpose of a Definition Tooltip is to provide additional help or define an item or term. Therefore, they should contain read-only text that is kept to a minimum. The use of interactive elements, such as Buttons or Links, is discouraged. Definition Tooltips appear on

children.value: Definition tooltip used to define a Form label.
Interactive Tooltips can contain text and other interactive elements such as a Button or a Link. They appear on mouse
and are persistent until intentionally dismissed by clicking outside of the tooltip.
